name: Smasher VR
description:
You came back home and someone trashed your house! Now you must clean it up and destroy whatever is not yours! Watch out, destroying your own item, you will loose points! Can you figure what your identity is? A gym rat? A musician? A scientist? 

Downloadable is a Android APK file built for Google Cardboard. With a controller you can walk around the house and experience the architecture in Virtual Reality (VR). 

The full game is built for Google Daydream which you can grab toss stuffs around to destroy them using the Daydream controller. 

** Game is a prototype developed in a weekend, therefore it is not fully optimized and might (definitely) have some bugs. **

Credits

Billy Hau - 3D Modeling and Game Development

Brandon Evans - Game Development

Matt Mathers - 3D Modeling and Texture

Patrick Coyne - Game Development

* Various 3D Models and Music from the Internet
